name: folioblocks-out-of-scope-script
Description: Technically, I created this to reduce my time on looking up the commands.

scripts.reload-chain: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/with_chain/** .; npm run backend
scripts.reload-registered: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/new/** .; npm run backend
scripts.reload-new: pwsh -Command npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend
